18 import rospy
19 from threading import Lock
20 from collections import OrderedDict
21 import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
22 
23 from ..common.abstract_io_panel import AbstractDigitalIOPanel
24 from ..common.io_objects import PinMode
25 from .rpi_io_objects import DigitalPin
26 
27 
28 class IOPanel(AbstractDigitalIOPanel):
29 
30  def __init__(self, lock=None):
31  super(IOPanel, self).__init__()
32 
33  GPIO.setwarnings(False)
34  GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
35 
36  if lock is None:
37  lock = Lock()
38  self.__lock = lock
39 
40  self._switches_name = []
41  self._init_ios()
42  self._publish_digital_io_state()
43 
44  def __del__(self):
45  GPIO.cleanup()
46 
47  def shutdown(self):
48  super(IOPanel, self).shutdown()
49  GPIO.cleanup()
50 
51  def _init_ios(self):
52  self._digital_outputs = OrderedDict([(digital_output["name"],
53  DigitalPin(self.__lock,
54  digital_output["pin"],
55  digital_output["name"],
56  PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT))
57  for digital_output in rospy.get_param("~digital_outputs")])
58 
59  self._digital_inputs = OrderedDict([(digital_input["name"],
60  DigitalPin(self.__lock,
61  digital_input["pin"],
62  digital_input["name"],
63  PinMode.DIGITAL_INPUT))
64  for digital_input in rospy.get_param("~digital_inputs")])
65 
66  for switch in rospy.get_param("~switches"):
67  self._switches_name.append(switch["name"])
68  self._digital_outputs[switch["name"]] = DigitalPin(self.__lock,
69  switch["pin"],
70  switch["name"],
71  PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT)
